Database Policy Reference

RLS Security Rule for Student Record Access:

CREATE POLICY "Students: Select" ON public.students FOR SELECT TO authenticated USING (school_id = get_user_school_id() AND (get_user_role() IN ('super_admin', 'school_admin', 'teacher') OR parent_user_profile_id = get_user_id()));
